英文法規名稱: Venue and Equipment Maintenance Fee Standards for the Nanhai Theater and the 3rd Exhibition Room of National Taiwan Arts Education Center
中文法規名稱: 國立臺灣藝術教育館南海劇場及第三展覽室場地設備維護規費收費標準
沿革內容:
1.Enacted by Letter Yi-Zhan-Zi No. 0930001954 on July 21, 2004
2.Revised by Order Yi-Zhan-Zi No. 0940001467 on June 1, 2005
3.Revised by Order Yi-Zhan-Zi No. 0940002376 on Sept. 8, 2005
4.Revised by Order Yi-Yan-Zi No. 1030001762 on May. 15, 2014

法規內容.條文內容: These Standards are stipulated in accordance with Article 10 of the Charges and Fees Act.

Venue and equipment maintenance fee standards for the Nanhai Theater and the 3rd Exhibition Room are as follows:

│Nanhai      │Morning   │08:30~  │NT$5,000  │NT$7,000    │
│Theater     │          │12:00   │          │            │
│            ├─────┼────┼─────┼──────┤
│            │Afternoon │13:30~  │NT$5,000  │NT$7,000    │
│            │          │17:00   │          │            │
│            ├─────┼────┼─────┼──────┤

│            │          │22:30   │          │            │

│Notes:                                                      │
│1.Venue usage includes the use of A/C, lighting and stereo  │
│  equipment.                                                │
│2.For the use of piano, choral stage and dance floor mat,   │
│  the time slots are the same as venue time slots.          │
│3.Users exceeding aforementioned time slots would be charged│
│  an additional NT$2,000 per hour for the venue, NT$20 per  │
│  hour for the piano, and NT$100 per hour for the choral    │
│  stage and the dance floor mat. Less than 1 hour would be  │
│  charged as 1 hour.                                        │
│4.Any sudden request for an additional session would not be │
│  accepted.                                                 │
│5.In order to maintain the quality of the venue for         │
│  sustainable use, venue  users may leave only after an     │
│  inspection by the center's technical staff following the  │
│  end of their performances and, as regulated, shall        │
│  compensate for any damages discovered.                    │
│6.Government agencies, schools, non-profit educational and  │
│  cultural organizations, and NPOs are given 20% discount   │
│  off the venue fees.                                       │
└──────────────────────────────┘
The charges stipulated in these Standards shall be examined and adjusted regularly according to the venue and equipment maintenance costs and the consumer price index (CPI).
These Standards shall take effect on the date of promulgation.
